> Message: 1
> Date: Tue, 07 Mar 2000 10:36:13 -0700
> From: "(Sabbat)" <vtemplarv@...>
> Subject: Name change / Some quesstions
>
> Grrrrr!
> Well I deleted Lasombra last night to change his stats around and the
system
> wouldn't let me use the name again. So Sabbat is the new me. Yes, I know
you
> are all thrilled to death. As a side note: at 1st level 10 Stamina = 1 HP.
>
> I bought my Grobb Cleaver when I had my TSK and am seeking infomation from
> those that have done the quest personally, DE xp preferred. I know the
> basics of the quest. Kill Nerbilik in OOT and get 3 HEHE meat from Oggok,
> give the recipe and meat (not stacked) to Carver. I also know that you can
> accidentally eat those stupid meats as well.
>
> Now for my questions.
> 1) What does Carver need to /con to recieve the Grobb Cleaver
> (indifferent/amiable/warmly)?
> 2) What faction is Carver tied to?
> 3) As a DE SK what faction hit do you take when you kill Nerbilik? Will
> killing him make me KoS if I haven't raised faction first? All I could
find
> was "you take a massive faction hit with trolls" which doesn't tell me
> didly.
> 4) Is Lyguna tied to Troll Shaman faction?
>
> I haven't killed a Froglock in a while, so I assume killing Froglocks
> increases all Troll faction if killed in the swamp. If so I will do this
to
> increase faction in Grobb before I attempt this quest.
>
> p.s.- Wake up this list! The only mail I have seen is stuff I have sent
and
> replies to it.
>
> --
> Sabbat
> DE SK
> 1st Tier of Hate
>
>
>
>
____________________________________________________________________________
___
>
____________________________________________________________________________
___
>
> Message: 2
> Date: Tue, 07 Mar 2000 10:45:39 -0700
> From: "(Sabbat)" <vtemplarv@...>
> Subject: Ring of the Dead
>
> More quest questions. :-)
>
> Is the Ring of the Dead still in the game?
> Does anyone know where the spawn point of Sir Lindeal is? I heard it was
> near the Goblin camp near Najena, and that when he spawns the wandering
mobs
> kill him pretty quickly.
> How often does he spawn? Is that in-game hours or RL hours?
>
> --
> Sabbat
>
>
>
>

>

> Date: Tue, 7 Mar 2000 12:43:41 -0500
> From: Chip O'Brien <cobrien@...>
> Subject: RE: Name change / Some quesstions

doesn't

> Message: 5
> Date: Tue, 07 Mar 2000 13:38:29 -0700
> From: "(Sabbat)" <vtemplarv@...>
> Subject: RE: Name change / Some quesstions
>
> RE: [shadowknight] Name change / Some quesstions 1) Not sure :
>
> That is ok, I will figure it out. I believe he is a level 20 mob, so I
will
> have no problem killing him. :-)
>
>
> 2) Probably "Da Bashers" :
>
> Figured it might be, but couldn't remember from my Troll days.
>
>
> 3) Faction hit is with "da Bashers" I think. Pretty big one, I've heard,
> so be careful. :
>
> I think I will have to kill with Andon (my 26th level Druid) and loot
> with Sabbat. Just need to camp him on the Isle and then log on as
> Andon/kill/log/loot as Sabbat. I know this will work as I have done it
> before. Loot rights open to anyone at about the time I can relog as the
one
> I want to loot the MoB. :-) Gotta love this game for that.
>
>
> 4) I've heard that killing Lynuga in the swamp will increase Da Basher and
> Nightkeep faction and lower the Root of Innoruuk faction (shamans).
>
> That is true. This is because Lyguna is involved in the Love Triangle
> between Hukulk and the lost love quest. She has the Happy Love Bracer i
> believe.
>
> Thanks for your responce.
>
> --
> Sabbat
> DE SK
> 1st Tier of Hate
>
> aka
> --
> Andon Uktena <Dark Omen>
> Halfling Druid
> 26th Season
>
> "The Unkempt Druids hold secrets unimaginable. I only wish I was one of
> them."
>
>
>

> Message: 9
> Date: Tue, 7 Mar 2000 14:49:53 -0800
> From: Matt Price <mattren@...>
> Subject: Lifeleech quest
>
> Anyone on this list 50 and have done this quest?
>
> I'll be 50 in 2 weeks or so, bout halfway through 48 now. I have a couple
> questions regarding the quest.
>
> 1.) The necro says to conceal your dark arts. this mean you have to have a
> non-necro\sk to do this part?
>
> 2.) can a group of 40-50s take the monstrous zombie that spawns? or will I
> need 2 groups?
>
> 3.) why the heck are we getting more nerftaps in the expansion when we
> already have lifeleech?
>
> Thanks in advance,
>
> Squiggles, lvl 48 TSK of VZ
>
>
>
____________________________________________________________________________
___
>
____________________________________________________________________________
___
>
> Message: 10
> Date: Tue, 7 Mar 2000 15:36:47 -0800 (PST)
> From: Countess Bathory D'Allatu <countess_bathory_69@...>
> Subject: Re: Lifeleech quest
>
>
>
> --- Matt Price <mattren@...> wrote:
> > Anyone on this list 50 and have done this quest?
> >
> > I'll be 50 in 2 weeks or so, bout halfway through 48
> > now. I have a couple
> > questions regarding the quest.
> >
> > 1.) The necro says to conceal your dark arts. this
> > mean you have to have a
> > non-necro\sk to do this part?
> >
> Need a druid to cast wolf form on you. The guy you get
> the faceted hycinth from along with the Dragonscale
> armor guy, who is in the same hut, are KoS to SKs
>
>
> > 2.) can a group of 40-50s take the monstrous zombie
> > that spawns? or will I
> > need 2 groups?
> >
>
> We did it easily with 1 group. A cleric is a must
> though. I got FEARd by him and ended up bugged. The
> FEAR had worn off, but i kept running anyway. I could
> sit down to stop running, but as soon as i stood, i
> started running again. I had to camp out, but they
> beat him even without me.
>
>
> > 3.) why the heck are we getting more nerftaps in the
> > expansion when we
> > already have lifeleech?
> >
>
> Lifeleech has a 2 minute recast time, and takes about
> 2 bubbles of mana to cast. Sometimes you just dont
> need that much, or you would rather cast faster
> spells. Just like any good cleric has multiple Heals
> mem'd and not just Complete Heal.
>
>
>
> =====
> Wherever a Light shines .. a Shadow is born.
> Bathory D'Allatu
> Cazic-Thule
